data.title: Akra Hotels Hosted the Hollywood Movie "Operation Fortune
data.text:
AKRA HOTELS HAS PROUDLY EARNED THE TITLE OF “TURKEY'S BEST EMPLOYER™” FOR THREE CONSECUTIVE YEARS!

With over 50 years of experience in the tourism industry, Akra Hotels has secured its place for the third consecutive year on Turkey's Best Employers™ list by Great Place to Work® Turkey, the global authority on workplace culture.

Discover

UN WOMEN WEPS

In a special ceremony, BHM signed the Women's Empowerment Principles, committing to implementing these principles with the goal of creating a fair, safe, and equal opportunity workplace culture, leveraging its knowledge, expertise, and experience spanning over 50 years in the industry.

Discover

BUKET YIKAMA IS INCLUDED IN THE "BEST EMPLOYERS LIST"!

Buket Yıkama has been recognized as one of Turkey's Best Employers™ 2023 by Great Place to Work® Turkey, the global authority on workplace culture, demonstrating that it has created a great workplace culture based on the employee experience.

Discover

“AKRA HOTELS” HAS ONCE AGAIN BEEN AWARDED THE TITLE OF “BEST EMPLOYER™ OF TURKEY”!

Akra Hotels, a subsidiary of BHM Hotel Management, has once again proven that it has created a great workplace culture based on employee experience by making it back to the Turkey's Best Employers™ 2023 list prepared by Great Place to Work® Turkey, the global authority on workplace culture.

Discover

AKRA HOTEL CONTINUES TO OFFER A UNIQUE VACATION EXPERIENCE!

With a philosophy that believes that different experiences and emotions enrich life and give it meaning, Akra Hotel continues to offer its guests much more than an ordinary vacation.

Discover

AKRA HOTELS IS IN UNESCO SUSTAINABLE TRAVEL PLEDGE PROJECT!

The "Sustainable Travel Pledge Project" developed by UNESCO is a global initiative that aims to promote sustainable tourism and minimise the negative impacts on tourism, which is one of the sectors that will be most affected by economic and political crises that may occur.

Discover

AKRA HOTELS, HOSTED THE CREW OF THE HOLLYWOOD FILM "OPERATION FORTUNE"

With its construction that combines peace and entertainment in a single area and its Urban Social concept that emphasises emotions and experiences, Akra Hotels has carried its perfect hospitality to its guests beyond the borders this time.

Discover

AT AKRA TALKS STAGE BURAK SERGEN HAS THE FLOOR THIS TIME

Within the scope of Akra Talks, which has attracted attention and great appreciation with its different topics since the day it was organised, art lovers of Antalya continue to come together with famous names that they follow with interest and love.

Discover

ASMANI RESTAURANT WITH ITS NEW FACE AND SERVICES

Asmani Restaurant within Akra Hotels, which brings together the perfect view of Antalya and delicious dishes in a pleasant atmosphere, continues to welcome its guests with its renewed interior design and services.

Discover

BHM HOSPITALITY RANKED SECOND IN TURKEY IN THE "BEST WORKPLACES FOR WOMEN" SURVEY

BHM Hospitality ranked second in Turkey in the 500+ employees category of the "Best Workplaces For Women" survey organised annually by Great Place to Work® Turkey, the global authority on workplace culture.

Discover

THE 4TH INTERNATIONAL MEZZE FESTIVAL WAS HELD WITH BITTERNESS

The 'International Mezze Festival', organised by Akra Hotel for the fourth time this year, was bitterly disappointed due to the firedamp explosion in Bartın, which left the whole country in mourning. The event, where the tickets of the festival participants were refunded and all programs were cancelled, ended with the 'tasting presentation' where the appetizers prepared by the chefs met only with the press members and the presentation of plaques.
